explains: vt. 使……敌对；使……对抗；对……起反作用

sentences.en: He didn't want to antagonize her.
sentences.cn: 他不想使她对自己产生敌意。

sentences.en: Not wishing to antagonize her further, he said no more.
sentences.cn: 他不愿惹她更生气，便不再说话。

sentences.en: Conclusion Middle dose zinc is enough to antagonize the toxicity of lead.
sentences.cn: 结论中等剂量的锌可以拮抗铅的毒性。
